What have I done?
1) Made it more reliable by duplicating all the resources in a new az
2) Pricing strategy on ec2:
Changed it to all pay later to save some cash at the current time
3) Scaled up resource
Scaled up cpu, ram and storage on ec2
Scaled up starage on database
4) Added more instances to db and ec2 to make it more reliable
5) Increased number of requests elb can handle
6) Increased capacity of NAT gateway to avoid any congestion due to traffic
